title: Mbitr
author: Mbitr
content: Free raffle - 3 packs of stickers3 Winners 1st Prize 2nd Prize 3rd Prize This raffle is free to enter and will be shipped world wide for free   A few little rules - please read- Please reply in the thread with the free number you select and your name eg , 13- Mbitr - no randoms !- No alt accounts - One spot per member- Junior members and above or at my discretion  Once full or as good as - I’ll pick 3 Bitcoin blocks and The last 2 numbers of the hash of those blocks will decide the winners. 3 different prizes, 3 different blocks and 3 different winners- if the same number occurs again, another block will be picked  GOOD LUCK ALL Thanks to all the members that I’ve copied and used their format to make this thread - TOO MANY TO MENTION
